## üñ•Ô∏è Server Settings (ServerSettings.ini)

### Basic Server Information
```ini
ServerName=My SCUM Server          # Display name for your server
ServerPassword=                     # Empty = no password required
ServerAdminPassword=admin123        # Admin console password
MaxPlayers=64                       # Maximum player count (1-100)
ServerPort=7777                     # Game connection port
QueryPort=7778                      # Steam query port
RCON_Port=7779                      # Remote console port
RCON_Password=rconpass123           # RCON authentication
```

### Server Visibility & Region
```ini
ServerRegion=US                     # US, EU, AS, OCE, SA, AF
ServerLanguage=EN                   # EN, ES, FR, DE, RU, etc.
ServerDescription=Welcome!          # Server description (max 256 chars)
ServerListed=true                   # Show in server browser
ServerPasswordRequired=false        # Password protection indicator
ServerWhitelistEnabled=false        # Whitelist mode
ServerBattlEyeRequired=true         # Anti-cheat requirement
```

### Connection & Performance
```ini
MaxPing=300                         # Maximum allowed ping (ms)
KickHighPing=false                  # Auto-kick high ping players
KickIdlePlayers=true                # Kick idle players
IdleKickTime=900                    # Idle time before kick (seconds)
TickRate=30                         # Server tick rate (20-60)
NetworkUpdateRate=20                # Network updates per second
MaxNetworkDataSize=65536            # Max network packet size (bytes)
UseCompression=true                 # Enable data compression
```

### Server Behavior
```ini
PauseWhenEmpty=false                # Pause simulation when empty
EnableAutoSave=true                 # Automatic world saves
AutoSaveInterval=300                # Auto-save interval (seconds)
EnableCrosshair=true                # Show crosshairs
EnableNameTags=true                 # Show player nametags
NameTagDistance=50.0                # Nametag visibility range (meters)
```

### Admin Tools
```ini
AdminLogActions=true                # Log admin commands
AdminChatPrefix=[ADMIN]             # Admin chat identifier
EnableAdminSpectate=true            # Allow spectator mode
EnableGodMode=false                 # Admin invincibility
EnableTeleport=false                # Admin teleportation
EnableSpawnItems=false              # Admin item spawning
```

### Ban System
```ini
MaxBanDuration=2592000              # Max ban duration (30 days)
BanByIP=true                        # IP-based banning
BanByHWID=true                      # Hardware ID banning
EnableTempBans=true                 # Temporary ban support
TempBanDuration=86400               # Default temp ban (24 hours)
```

### Chat & Voice
```ini
EnableGlobalChat=true               # Server-wide text chat
EnableProximityChat=true            # Local area chat
EnableGroupChat=true                # Squad/faction chat
EnableWhisper=true                  # Private messages
ProximityChatRange=50.0             # Proximity chat range (meters)
ChatMessageCooldown=1.0             # Anti-spam cooldown (seconds)
MaxChatMessageLength=256            # Max message length
EnableChatFilter=true               # Profanity filter

EnableVoiceChat=true                # Voice communication
VoiceQuality=medium                 # low, medium, high
VoiceCodec=opus                     # opus, speex
VoiceBitrate=64000                  # Voice quality (bits/sec)
EnablePushToTalk=true               # Require PTT
VoiceRange=50.0                     # Voice chat range (meters)
```

## üéÆ Game Settings (Game.ini)

### Time & Day/Night Cycle
```ini
TimeAcceleration=4.0                # Time speed multiplier (1.0-10.0)
TimeAccelerationNightMultiplier=8.0 # Night time speed boost
DayDuration=3600.0                  # Day length (seconds)
NightDuration=1800.0                # Night length (seconds)
StartTime=8.0                       # Server start time (0-24 hours)
EnableDynamicTimeOfDay=true         # Dynamic time progression
SeasonalWeatherEnabled=true         # Seasonal weather patterns
CurrentSeason=Summer                # Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter
```

### World & Safe Zones
```ini
WorldSize=large                     # small, medium, large, huge
EnableSafezones=true                # Protected areas
SafezoneRadius=100.0                # Safe zone size (meters)
NoobProtectionTime=1800.0           # New player protection (seconds)
SafezoneKillPenalty=true            # Punish safe zone kills
```

### Damage & Combat
```ini
PuppetDamageMultiplier=1.0          # Zombie damage (0.1-10.0)
PlayerDamageMultiplier=1.0          # PvP damage (0.1-10.0)
AnimalDamageMultiplier=1.0          # Wildlife damage (0.1-10.0)
FallDamageMultiplier=1.0            # Fall damage (0.0-5.0)
ExplosionDamageMultiplier=1.0       # Explosive damage (0.1-10.0)
HeadshotMultiplier=2.5              # Headshot damage bonus
LimbDamageMultiplier=0.75           # Limb damage reduction
EnableBleedingDamage=true           # Bleeding system
BleedingRate=1.0                    # Blood loss speed (0.1-5.0)
```

### Metabolism & Survival
```ini
MetabolismRateMultiplier=1.0        # Overall metabolism (0.1-5.0)
HungerRateMultiplier=1.0            # Hunger increase speed
ThirstRateMultiplier=1.0            # Thirst increase speed
StaminaRegenerationMultiplier=1.0   # Stamina recovery speed
EnergyConsumptionMultiplier=1.0     # Energy burn rate
CalorieBurnMultiplier=1.0           # Calorie consumption rate
EnableVitamins=true                 # Vitamin system
VitaminDecayRate=1.0                # Vitamin depletion speed
EnableDiseases=true                 # Disease mechanics
DiseaseChance=0.1                   # Disease probability (0.0-1.0)
EnableBladderSimulation=true        # Bladder system
BladderFillRate=1.0                 # Bladder fill speed
```

### Loot System
```ini
LootSpawnMultiplier=1.0             # Overall loot amount (0.1-10.0)
LootQualityMultiplier=1.0           # Loot quality (0.1-5.0)
LootRespawnTime=1800.0              # Loot respawn delay (seconds)
WeaponSpawnMultiplier=1.0           # Weapon spawn rate
AmmoSpawnMultiplier=1.0             # Ammunition spawn rate
FoodSpawnMultiplier=1.0             # Food spawn rate
MedicalSpawnMultiplier=1.0          # Medical items spawn rate
ClothingSpawnMultiplier=1.0         # Clothing spawn rate
ToolSpawnMultiplier=1.0             # Tools spawn rate
RareItemChance=0.05                 # Rare item probability (0.0-1.0)
EnableRandomLoot=true               # Randomized loot
EnableLootTiers=true                # Tiered loot quality
```

### Item Durability
```ini
ItemDurabilityMultiplier=1.0        # Overall durability (0.1-10.0)
WeaponDurabilityMultiplier=1.0      # Weapon wear rate
ArmorDurabilityMultiplier=1.0       # Armor wear rate
ToolDurabilityMultiplier=1.0        # Tool wear rate
EnableItemDecay=true                # Item degradation
DecayRateMultiplier=1.0             # Decay speed (0.1-5.0)
```

### Respawn System
```ini
RespawnTime=60.0                    # Death respawn delay (seconds)
RespawnProtectionTime=30.0          # Spawn protection duration
EnableShelterRespawn=true           # Respawn at shelters
EnableSquadRespawn=true             # Squad respawn points
RespawnPointCooldown=300.0          # Respawn point cooldown (seconds)
MaxRespawnPoints=5                  # Max spawn points per player
RespawnHealthMultiplier=0.5         # Spawn health percentage
RespawnInventoryKeep=false          # Keep inventory on death
DeathPenaltyEnabled=true            # Death penalties
DeathPenaltyMultiplier=0.1          # Penalty severity (0.0-1.0)
```

### PvP Combat
```ini
EnablePvP=true                      # Player vs Player combat
EnableFriendlyFire=true             # Team damage
FriendlyFireMultiplier=0.5          # Team damage reduction
PvPDamageMultiplier=1.0             # PvP damage scaling
EnableKillFeed=true                 # Show kill notifications
KillReward=100                      # Points for kills
DeathPenalty=50                     # Points lost on death
EnableTeamKillPenalty=true          # Punish team kills
TeamKillPenaltyMultiplier=2.0       # Team kill penalty severity
EnableCombatLog=true                # Combat logging
CombatLogDuration=30.0              # Combat timer (seconds)
```

### Vehicles
```ini
VehicleTimeout=300.0                # Abandoned vehicle timeout
VehicleFuelConsumptionMultiplier=1.0 # Fuel usage rate
VehicleDamageMultiplier=1.0         # Vehicle damage taken
VehicleRepairMultiplier=1.0         # Repair effectiveness
VehicleSpeedMultiplier=1.0          # Vehicle speed modifier
EnableVehicleDecay=true             # Vehicle degradation
VehicleDecayTime=7200.0             # Decay timer (seconds)
VehicleSpawnMultiplier=1.0          # Vehicle spawn rate
MaxVehiclesPerPlayer=3              # Vehicle ownership limit
EnableVehicleLocking=true           # Vehicle locks
VehicleLocksBreakable=true          # Locks can be broken
VehiclePartDamageMultiplier=1.0     # Part damage rate
EnableVehiclePhysics=true           # Realistic physics
VehicleExplosionDamage=true         # Vehicles can explode
```

### Resources & Materials
```ini
BatteryDrainMultiplier=1.0          # Battery consumption rate
FuelConsumptionMultiplier=1.0       # Fuel usage rate
ResourceSpawnMultiplier=1.0         # Resource availability
ResourceDecayMultiplier=1.0         # Resource degradation
EnableResourcePersistence=true      # Save resource states
WoodGatheringMultiplier=1.0         # Wood harvest rate
StoneGatheringMultiplier=1.0        # Stone harvest rate
MetalGatheringMultiplier=1.0        # Metal harvest rate
ClothGatheringMultiplier=1.0        # Cloth harvest rate
ElectronicsGatheringMultiplier=1.0  # Electronics harvest rate
ChemicalsGatheringMultiplier=1.0    # Chemicals harvest rate
```

### Base Building
```ini
WorldDecayMultiplier=1.0            # Structure decay rate
BuildingDecayTime=604800.0          # Base decay time (7 days)
EnableWorldPersistence=true         # Save world state
WorldSaveInterval=300.0             # Auto-save interval (seconds)
MaxWorldAge=2592000.0               # Max world age (30 days)
EnableBaseBuilding=true             # Allow construction
MaxBasesPerPlayer=3                 # Base limit per player
BaseRadiusLimit=50.0                # Base size limit (meters)
BuildingHealthMultiplier=1.0        # Structure HP modifier
BuildingCostMultiplier=1.0          # Build cost modifier
EnableBaseDamage=true               # Bases can be damaged
EnableBaseRaiding=true              # Raiding allowed
RaidWindowStart=18.0                # Raid hours begin (24h)
RaidWindowEnd=6.0                   # Raid hours end (24h)
```

### Economy & Trading
```ini
EnableTrading=true                  # Trading system
TradingFeeMultiplier=0.05           # Trade tax (5%)
MarketUpdateInterval=3600.0         # Market refresh (seconds)
EnableDynamicPricing=true           # Dynamic economy
BaseResourceValue=1.0               # Base resource price
MoneySpawnMultiplier=1.0            # Currency spawn rate
StartingMoney=1000                  # Starting currency
MaxMoneyPerPlayer=1000000           # Money cap
EnablePlayerTrading=true            # Player-to-player trading
TradeDistance=5.0                   # Trade range (meters)
EnableBlackMarket=false             # Black market dealers
```

### Crafting System
```ini
CraftingTimeMultiplier=1.0          # Crafting speed (0.1-10.0)
CraftingCostMultiplier=1.0          # Material cost (0.1-5.0)

CraftingQualityVariance=0.2         # Quality randomness
EnableMassCrafting=true             # Batch crafting
CraftingExperienceMultiplier=1.0    # XP from crafting
```

### Weather System
```ini

RainFrequency=0.3                   # Rain probability (0.0-1.0)
FogFrequency=0.2                    # Fog probability
StormFrequency=0.1                  # Storm probability

WindSpeedMultiplier=1.0             # Wind strength
EnableWeatherDamage=true            # Weather can damage
LightningStrikeChance=0.05          # Lightning probability
```

### AI (Puppets/Zombies)
```ini

EnableAIHordes=true                 # Horde events
HordeSize=15                        # Zombies per horde
HordeSpawnChance=0.1                # Horde probability
EnableAIVariation=true              # Different AI types
```

### Wildlife
```ini
AnimalSpawnMultiplier=1.0           # Animal spawn rate
```


### Performance Optimization


### Skills & Progression

## ‚öôÔ∏è Engine Settings (Engine.ini)

### Network Configuration
```ini
MaxClientRate=100000                # Max client bandwidth (bytes/sec)
MaxInternetClientRate=100000        # Max internet bandwidth
NetServerMaxTickRate=30             # Max server tick rate
LanServerMaxTickRate=30             # Max LAN tick rate
bClampListenServerTickRate=False    # Limit listen server ticks
n.VerifyPeer=false                  # Peer verification
n.UseCompression=true               # Data compression
n.ConnectionTimeout=30.0            # Connection timeout (seconds)
n.InitialConnectTimeout=30.0        # Initial connection timeout
n.AckTimeout=2.0                    # Acknowledgment timeout
n.KeepAliveTimeout=10.0             # Keep-alive timeout
n.ConnectionRetries=3               # Connection retry attempts
```

### Rendering Settings
```ini
r.DefaultFeature.MotionBlur=False   # Motion blur effect
r.DefaultFeature.Bloom=False        # Bloom effect
r.DefaultFeature.AntiAliasing=0     # Anti-aliasing (0-4)
r.DefaultFeature.LensFlare=False    # Lens flare effect
r.DefaultFeature.AmbientOcclusion=False # Ambient occlusion
r.ShadowQuality=0                   # Shadow quality (0-4)
r.Shadow.MaxResolution=256          # Max shadow resolution
r.DetailMode=0                      # Detail mode (0-2)
```

### Quality Presets
```ini
sg.ResolutionQuality=75             # Resolution quality (0-100)
sg.ViewDistanceQuality=2            # View distance (0-3)
sg.AntiAliasingQuality=2            # AA quality (0-3)
sg.ShadowQuality=2                  # Shadow quality (0-3)
sg.PostProcessQuality=2             # Post-processing (0-3)
sg.TextureQuality=2                 # Texture quality (0-3)
sg.EffectsQuality=2                 # Effects quality (0-3)
sg.FoliageQuality=2                 # Foliage density (0-3)
sg.ShadingQuality=2                 # Shading quality (0-3)
```

### Mouse & Keyboard
```ini
MouseSensitivity=1.000000           # Mouse sensitivity
bEnableMouseSmoothing=True          # Mouse smoothing
MouseSmoothingStrength=0.100000     # Smoothing amount
bInvertMouse=False                  # Invert mouse Y-axis
bEnableRawInput=True                # Raw input mode
```

### Gamepad
```ini
bEnableGamepadInput=True            # Gamepad support
GamepadDeadZone=0.250000            # Dead zone size (0.0-1.0)
```

## üöÄ Quick Reference

### Most Common Tweaks

#### Make Server Easier (PvE Focus)
```ini
# In Game.ini:
PlayerDamageMultiplier=0.5          # Reduce player damage taken
PuppetDamageMultiplier=0.7          # Reduce zombie damage
LootSpawnMultiplier=2.0             # Double loot spawns
MetabolismRateMultiplier=0.5        # Slower hunger/thirst
RespawnTime=30.0                    # Faster respawns
```

#### Make Server Harder (Hardcore)
```ini
# In Game.ini:
PlayerDamageMultiplier=2.0          # Double damage taken
PuppetDamageMultiplier=1.5          # Stronger zombies
LootSpawnMultiplier=0.5             # Reduce loot
MetabolismRateMultiplier=2.0        # Faster hunger/thirst
RespawnTime=300.0                   # Longer death penalty
AIMaxCount=100                      # More zombies
EnableAIHordes=true                 # Enable hordes
HordeSize=30                        # Larger hordes
```

#### High Performance Settings
```ini
# In Game.ini:
MaxTickRate=20.0                    # Lower tick rate
SimulationDistance=5000.0           # Reduce simulation range
AIMaxCount=25                       # Fewer AI entities
EnablePerformanceOptimization=true  # Enable optimization
DespawnDistance=3000.0              # Closer despawn range

# In Engine.ini:
NetServerMaxTickRate=20             # Lower network rate
MaxClientRate=50000                 # Reduce bandwidth

# In Scalability.ini:
sg.ViewDistanceQuality=1            # Lower view distance
sg.ShadowQuality=0                  # Disable shadows
sg.EffectsQuality=0                 # Lower effects
```

#### High Loot / Action Server
```ini
# In Game.ini:
LootSpawnMultiplier=3.0             # Triple loot
WeaponSpawnMultiplier=2.0           # More weapons
AmmoSpawnMultiplier=3.0             # More ammo
LootRespawnTime=600.0               # Faster respawn (10 min)
VehicleSpawnMultiplier=2.0          # More vehicles
AIMaxCount=75                       # More action
EnableAIHordes=true                 # Enable hordes
EnableRandomEvents=true             # More events
AirdropFrequency=1800.0             # Frequent airdrops (30 min)
```

#### RP / Realism Server
```ini
# In Game.ini:
TimeAcceleration=1.0                # Real-time
MetabolismRateMultiplier=1.5        # Realistic metabolism
EnableVitamins=true                 # Vitamin system
EnableDiseases=true                 # Disease system
EnableBladderSimulation=true        # Bladder system
CraftingTimeMultiplier=2.0          # Slower crafting
BuildingDecayTime=1209600.0         # 14-day decay
EnableFactions=true                 # Faction roleplay
EnableTrading=true                  # Economy
EnablePlayerTrading=true            # Player trading
```

---

## üí° Tips & Best Practices

### Server Stability
- Keep `MaxPlayers` under 100 for stability
- Set `AutoSaveInterval` to 300-600 seconds
- Enable `EnablePerformanceOptimization=true`
- Monitor `MaxTickRate` - don't exceed 30 for most servers

### Player Retention
- Balance `LootSpawnMultiplier` (1.5-2.0 for fun, 0.5-1.0 for challenge)
- Set reasonable `RespawnTime` (30-120 seconds)
- Enable `EnableSafezones=true` for new players
- Use `NoobProtectionTime=1800` (30 minutes)

### Performance
- Lower `AIMaxCount` if experiencing lag
- Reduce `SimulationDistance` on lower-end hardware
- Set `EnableLODSystem=true` and `EnableOcclusionCulling=true`
- Use `MaxNetworkDataSize=65536` or lower for bandwidth savings

### Security
- **Always** set strong `ServerAdminPassword` and `RCON_Password`
- Enable `ServerBattlEyeRequired=true`
- Set `EnableAntiCheat=true` with all detection methods
- Use `LogSecurityViolations=true` to track issues

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notes

1. **Backup Before Changes:** Always backup your config files before making changes
2. **Test Changes:** Test configuration changes on a private server first
3. **Server Restart Required:** Most changes require a server restart to take effect
4. **Invalid Values:** Invalid settings may cause server startup failures
5. **Multipliers:** Most multipliers accept values from 0.1 to 10.0
6. **Boolean Values:** Use `true` or `false` (case-sensitive)
